on reading compounds: 係争【ケイソウ】contention, dispute, conflict, controversy
連係【レンケイ】connection, linking, linkage, link
kun reading compounds: 繋ぐ【つなぐ】to connect, to link together, to tie, to fasten, to restrain, to maintain, to preserve, to keep, to transfer (phone call), to put a person through, to hedge, to buy or sell forward
